A stubborn raccoon once lost its wits. Along came an evil parrot who thought "A terrorist like me needs an infidel like this for my jihads."
"For the best infidels are unholy fools," thought the evil parrot. So this terrorist decided to launch a jihad against the stubborn raccoon.

@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds So Flotsam developed a sense of kinship with Jetsam
